sessionSummary: Implemented FLF2V (First-Last-Frame-to-Video) logic, added feature flag, and verified with unit and E2E tests.

decisions.rationale: To safely introduce the new chaining logic without affecting existing workflows.
To use a shared WebSocket connection for better reliability and to support the new chaining logic.

currentState.status: FLF2V logic implemented and verified. Ready for manual testing.

nextSteps: Manually test FLF2V workflow with ComfyUI
